MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA15 postcode area of Greenock, affecting properties in Nicolson Street and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 4PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9PM. If this information changes then we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:42PM on 14 October 2020
